name: Dream Inc.
description:
A singleplayer puzzle game where the player has to switch between two characters to overcome the obstacles on his way. Dream Inc is set in the mind of a patient with a trauma, which he wishes to get rid of, while confronting the fears in his mind with the help of the doctor from Dream Inc.

This game was made as an academic project at Feevale University.

PS. The game is only available in Brazilian Portuguese.

The team:

Caio Rosa;

Gabriel Born;

Giordano Jankovski;

Lucas Schierholt;

Luis Almeida.
